entry.title: Combined summary - Broken Threading
entry.summary: The writer of the message apologizes for the inconvenience caused by a threading issue resulting from auto-forwarding between mail providers. To solve this issue, the writer has created a new dedicated outlook account with the email address thyshizzle at outlook.com. Going forward, this new account will be used for all subscriptions and the yahoo address will be unsubscribed. This step is expected to fix the threading issue.
